about_the_game:
NetCrusher – Become the master of hacking!
In a cyberpunk world where technology is a weapon, infiltrate the most secure systems and uncover secrets buried within the network.

Take control of the Ghost of a former NetRunner and use MUSE-V2, an advanced hacking AI, to outsmart firewalls and countermeasures. Through Tetromino-inspired puzzles, break protections, capture cycles, and transform them into attacks.

💾 Hack 3 types of targets:

  • Neural systems – Dive into the minds of machines.

  • Equipment – Take control of critical devices.

  • Servers – Exploit their vulnerabilities for profit.

💀 Face the ICE:

  • Barriers, sentinels, and defensive AIs will try to stop you.

  • Sentinels attack at every cycle: think fast and counterattack!

  • If your shield falls, MUSE-V2 is destroyed... and your mission fails.

Succeed in your hacks, accumulate credits, and perfect your machine. Every mission is a strategic challenge where speed and ingenuity make the difference.

Do you have what it takes to dominate the network?

content_descriptors.notes:
On the visual side, the game is set in a cyberpunk context, which implies a certain civilizational decadence, alcohol, drugs, etc...
What's more, camera hacking can lead to a form of voyeurism.
